message.content:
cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.IT, cs.CG, cs.DM 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper deals with approximation algorithms, which is a core topic in this sub-category. 
2. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper discusses the complexity of obtaining an integral vector from a fractional LP solution, which is a topic of interest in this sub-category. 
3. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper uses the concept of approximate entropy, which is a topic studied in this sub-category. 
4. cs.CG (Computational Geometry) - The paper mentions the use of discrepancy theory, which is a topic studied in this sub-category. 
5. cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) - The paper deals with discrete optimization problems and rounding fractional solutions, which are topics studied in this sub-category.
